titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman in Buckinghamshire near Water-Stratford. To his brother Mr. Thomas Pickfat at the Three Kings in White-cross-street, in London. Giving an account of the doctrine and ... the behaviour of Mr. Mason ... with the hymns they usually sing.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, print show-through with much loss of text; t. p. partially obscured.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
